alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 30 at 3:13PM MDT until March 31 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches on the valley floor and 4 to 10 inches on the benches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Tooele and Rush Valleys, Northern Wasatch Front and Salt Lake Valley. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to noon MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Friday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will become widespread late this evening and continue into Friday morning before becoming showery in the afternoon. Snow will be heavy at times, particularly along the east benches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys
